definition: sick man
illness/CL:場|场[chang2]/disease/to fall ill/defect
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
husband/man/manual worker/conscripted laborer (old)
(derog.) the sick man of Asia (term used in the West in the late 19th and early 20th centuries to refer to China in its weakened state after the Opium Wars)

sentences.english: Once again, the phrase “sick man of Europe” is trotted out.
sentences.chinese: 又一次，歐洲病夫的稱號落到英國的頭上。

sentences.english: A decade ago Germany was the “sick man of Europe.”
sentences.chinese: 十年前，德國是“歐洲病夫”。

sentences.english: He has been a sick man from youth.
sentences.chinese: 他從年輕時就一直是個病夫。

sentences.english: When we were the Sick Man of Asia, We were called the Yellow Peril.
sentences.chinese: 曾經我們是東亞病夫，我們被叫成黃禍。

sentences.english: Can't let foreigners regard us as the sick man of East Asia again.
sentences.chinese: 再不能讓外國人把我們看作東亞病夫了。

sentences.english: We will never forger the immense insult of being called "Oriental Sick Men".
sentences.chinese: 我們永遠不會忘記“東亞病夫”的奇恥大辱。

definition: (derog.) the sick man of Asia (term used in the West in the late 19th and early 20th centuries to refer to China in its weakened state after the Opium Wars)
shit youth/used satirically against 憤青|愤青 which shares the same sound/see also 憤青|愤青[fen4 qing1]
Yellow Peril, political novel by Wang Lixiong 王力雄[Wang2 Li4 xiong2]
yellow peril (offensive term referring to the perceived threat to Western nations, of immigration or military expansion from East Asian nations)
presumptuous and ignorant person
ignorant masses/to keep the people in ignorance
traitor
angry youth/positive term used to describe young Chinese with extreme nationalistic tendencies/see also 糞青|粪青[fen4 qing1]
pitiful creature/wretch
keyboard warrior
(neologism) person who posts online in support of the Chinese government, but unlike a wumao 五毛[wu3 mao2], is not paid for doing so (abbr. for 自帶乾糧的五毛|自带干粮的五毛[zi4 dai4 gan1 liang2 de5 wu3 mao2])
handicapped person/useless person
fifty cents party (person supposed to relay government propaganda on Internet sites)
to be the most ridiculous thing in the world (idiom)
pinyin: hua2 tian1 xia4 zhi1 da4 ji1

definition: rice tub (from which cooked rice or other food is served)/(fig.) fathead/a good-for-nothing
to criticize harshly/to denounce/to attack viciously
to get trampled on (idiom)/to be taken advantage of
